title: NEET Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita Specials

synonyms: Somehow, I Started Living With a NEET Otaku Kunoichi
NEET de Otaku na Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita Episode 25 and 26
alternative_titles.en: I'm Living with an Otaku NEET Kunoichi!? Specials
alternative_titles.ja: ニートくノ一となぜか同棲はじめました OVA

synopsis: Special episodes of NEET Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita that were streamed in advance on several streaming services, and later included on the series Blu-ray volumes.
